extendedInfo.description: Orchid is an easy to use appointment scheduling app for medical spa owners, employees, and independent contractors that lets you manage your med spa business on the go. Whether youâre using the Windows Edition of Orchid with Remote Access, or using our completely web-based Orchid Cloud app, you can enjoy all the benefits of being mobile. COSTRemote Access and the Cloud Premium editions are free for the first month, and Cloud Lite is free forever. For detailed pricing information, please visit our website.EASY-TO-USE APPOINTMENT BOOKQuickly flip through days on your calendar, view and schedule appointments, and book time blocks to mark yourself off the appointment book.  Orchid is a great scheduler app for any size medical spa or spa salon, and medical spa owners and managers can even check out the appointment schedule of any of the spaâs employees, like all of your practitioners, therapists, or aestheticians. It also works great for independent contractor scheduling, or mobile med spa employees like mobile massage therapists.EASILY MANAGE CLIENT INFOView your clientsâ notes, see what products and services theyâve purchased in the past, all their upcoming appointments, and even send them a quick text or e-mail right from the app. Orchid is a useful medical spa client manager and makes it easy to keep up-to-date and in contact with all of your spaâs clients.MANAGE TIME BLOCKSNot just a med spa appointment scheduler, you can block out time on your calendar to let everybody at the spa know when youâre not available. The appointment book is always in-sync, so everybody will instantly know your availability. CREDIT CARD PROCESSINGProcess credit cards right from your device. You can swipe cards using a convenient mobile credit card reader, or type in credit card information to process credit card or debit card transactions. Even e-mail a receipt when youâre done!PRODUCT SALES AND INVENTORY Manage your spaâs product inventory, and even sell products to clients right on your phone or tablet. Inventory is maintained automatically as products are sold, so you can always know how much retail product you have in the spa at any time.OVER 25 SPA REPORTSCheck your total spa sales, employee percentage booked, product inventory levels, and more right from your phone. Weâve included over 25 comprehensive business reports to make running your medical spa from anywhere a breeze. OTHER FEATURESâ¢ View your appointment book schedule, and even create or modify appointments on your calendarâ¢ Close tickets with any payment type, including credit cardsâ¢ Add, modify, and remove clientsâ¢ Add, modify, and remove productsâ¢ Add, modify, and remove servicesâ¢ Add and manage employee tipsâ¢ Add and modify spa employeesâ¢ Manage employee online accountsâ¢ Customizable categories and settingsâ¢ Call or text clients right from your deviceSUPPORT QUESTIONSIf you experience any problems please contact our customer support specialists via e-mail at support@daysmart.com or by phone at (800) 604-2040.PLEASE NOTE: As of May 1, 2013 this app requires a paid monthly subscription of $9/month per user if you wish to use this app to connect to your home or business PC. Our free cloud service that also works with this app and pricing for the paid cloud service have not changed. This pricing change was necessary to assure that we can continue to support our customers with the best possible products. After nearly three years of free service and two years of development time into our latest suite of products, it was clear that we could not continue with a completely free version of this app. Although our large user base is a complement to our products, it also generates a significant load on our services, which are costly to maintain. Keeping quality as the foremost goal, we decided to not introduce advertisements in our applications and instead introduce a straight-forward, simple, and reasonably priced subscription plan.

reviews.title: I never feel too far away from the shop with my Orchid app
reviews.comment: I have Orchid running on the newest Nexus 7 tablet with Android 4.3 Jellybean and it runs flawlessly. I think that anyone looking for a convenient way to keep track of their business and their clients would love the Orchid app. This app helps you keep meticulous details of your business and makes you feel like you\'re never too far from the shop, which is convenient for me as a business owner as I am always on call waiting for the next emergency at the shop that requires my help. But with all the administrative tools that Orchid gives me in the grips of my hands, I never feel too far away from the shop no matter how remote I may be. As long as I have a data or wireless connection, I can be miles away but still feel like I\'m there with this app. Two thumbs up for Orchid. And another thing that is great about Orchid software is that their technical support lines are always based in the states for convenient help. I highly recommend anyone to try out Orchid to see what they\'ve been missing.
reviews.author: Michael Warunek

reviews.comment: love it . . would just like to get notifications when a new appointment is added instead of having to log in all  the time to check
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Would also like ability to block off time.

reviews.title: Not bad, but not the greatest.
Needs offline capabilities
reviews.comment: Great to have and book appointments, but useless if the spa computer is offline. Wish it had access as a mobile standalone with sync options to main computer.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Orchid
reviews.comment: It is a great practice management tool.  I can\'t imagine how I worked without it before.
reviews.author: Marlene Fuson

reviews.comment: Really great app, would like to see the function of scheduling a time block, a well as run totals reports on all employees
